post.body: Do you have a pro account or subscription w/ Lastfm or just use the free acct? I was wondering the difference.
Well you and your lady have a great New Year's and have fun and be safe!! Cheers to you!
Christmas was good w/ my boys. 1 week off from work-almost always a good thing. Sorry for your dad. :( Plans for New Years Eve?Party
Yayyy for you!! Cocktails a great reward! Hope your Christmas was good!
you're off for 2 whole weeks?! WOW! Congrats! Have fun!
Madagascar Movie!! Hehehe
I totally miss Mixwit ...badddd!! U make ur own playlists from the music they had. Not like lastfm/jamendo - Better I thought.
Back @ work after New Year's Break...yes this early in the friggin' morning. Hope everyone had a good New Year's.
Okay soo finally leaving work so everyone have a FUCKIN' Happy New Year! Out of here...
why am i at work again?
Is voting for your avatar in Twitter Avatar Combat at http://twit.pix.ly #avatarcombat
And of course he is on Blip.fm... ♫ http://blip.fm/~1cw0v
Music all day for me...Listening to Mr. Costlow now - to calm me down...maybe I can get some work done.
can this day get any fucking longer??
Korn bayybee ♫ http://blip.fm/~1cu9j
As of now - my favorite R&B song Rehab - Rihanna ♫ http://blip.fm/~1cru4
someone slap me in the face!!!!!!!
Merry Christmas Guys!
NOOOOOOOO Mixwit is shutting down in a few weeks!!!!! :( Their site was awesome!! http://www.mixwit.com/
